RES.BR.summary: Resilux NV manufactures and sells polyethylene terephthalate (PET) preforms and bottles worldwide. Its preforms and bottles are used for packaging water, carbonated soft drinks, edible oils, ketchup, detergents, milk, beers, soft drinks, wines, fruit juices, and other applications. The company's products are also used to produce wide mouth jars, packaging foils, and blister packs. In addition, it provides in-house, wall-to-wall, and satellite blowing services; and PET recycling services. The company primarily serves producers of drinks, food, and household products. Resilux NV was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Wetteren, Belgium.
